## DurableOperation.sendCallbackFailure() method

Sends a callback failure to the durable execution service.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendCallbackFailure(error?: ErrorObject): Promise<SendDurableExecutionCallbackFailureResponse>;
```

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

ErrorObject

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;SendDurableExecutionCallbackFailureResponse&gt;

A promise that resolves to the callback failure response

## Exceptions

Will throw an error if callback details are not available
